title: Remove duplicate volume input in Pre‑Meditation setup container

requirements.text: On the Pre‑Meditation page, remove the duplicate volume input element from the selected container (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[3]) so that only a single volume control remains in that container and there are no two volume inputs that control the same audio volume.

quotes: I selected volume element, it should be remove from that container in pre-med page. Because the are 2 volume input elements in the same container that does the same thing.

acceptanceCriteria: In the Pre‑Meditation page UI, the selected container shows only one volume input/control (no duplicate/second volume input in the same container).
Changing the remaining volume control updates the ambient audio volume as before.
No other controls in that container (other than the duplicate volume element) are removed or functionally changed.

constraints: Apply changes only to the selected element/container identified by XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[3.
nonGoals: Do not implement the other requested changes in this build (dashboard quote persistence, button size reductions, dashboard Begin/Quiz behavior changes, Save as ritual visibility changes, or circular meditation timer).
